name: Basic Gardening Tools
description: A watering can, pruning shears, hand trowel, and spray bottle form the foundation of any plant care routine.

name: Quality Soil & Potting Mix
description: The right soil retains moisture, drains well, and supports root growth. Choose mixes based on plant typeâ€”succulent, tropical, or flowering.

name: Moisture & Light Meters
description: Use simple tools to monitor soil moisture and sunlight exposure. Prevent overwatering and ensure each plant gets what it needs.

name: Environment Control
description: Humidity trays, grow lights, and temperature gauges help recreate ideal conditions for plants, especially indoors or in varying seasons.

name: Fertilizers & Nutrients
description: Feed your plants with balanced or specialty fertilizers. Know when and how often to fertilize to avoid burn or deficiency.

name: Pest & Disease Control
description: Protect your plants from common threats like aphids, fungus, and root rot using natural remedies or plant-safe sprays. Early detection is key.
